argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | subrgmcl.p | |- .x. = ( .r ` R ) |
| 2 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( R |`s A ) = ( R |`s A ) |
| 3 | 2 | #P_subrgring | |- ( A e. ( SubRing ` R ) -> ( R |`s A ) e. Ring ) |
| 4 | 3 | #P_3ad2ant1 | |- ( ( A e. ( SubRing ` R ) /\ X e. A /\ Y e. A ) -> ( R |`s A ) e. Ring ) |
| 5 |  | #P_simp2 | |- ( ( A e. ( SubRing ` R ) /\ X e. A /\ Y e. A ) -> X e. A ) |
| 6 | 2 | #P_subrgbas | |- ( A e. ( SubRing ` R ) -> A = ( Base ` ( R |`s A ) ) ) |
| 7 | 6 | #P_3ad2ant1 | |- ( ( A e. ( SubRing ` R ) /\ X e. A /\ Y e. A ) -> A = ( Base ` ( R |`s A ) ) ) |
| 8 | 5, 7 | #P_eleqtrd | |- ( ( A e. ( SubRing ` R ) /\ X e. A /\ Y e. A ) -> X e. ( Base ` ( R |`s A ) ) ) |
| 9 |  | #P_simp3 | |- ( ( A e. ( SubRing ` R ) /\ X e. A /\ Y e. A ) -> Y e. A ) |
| 10 | 9, 7 | #P_eleqtrd | |- ( ( A e. ( SubRing ` R ) /\ X e. A /\ Y e. A ) -> Y e. ( Base ` ( R |`s A ) ) ) |
| 11 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( Base ` ( R |`s A ) ) = ( Base ` ( R |`s A ) ) |
| 12 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( .r ` ( R |`s A ) ) = ( .r ` ( R |`s A ) ) |
| 13 | 11, 12 | #P_ringcl | |- ( ( ( R |`s A ) e. Ring /\ X e. ( Base ` ( R |`s A ) ) /\ Y e. ( Base ` ( R |`s A ) ) ) -> ( X ( .r ` ( R |`s A ) ) Y ) e. ( Base ` ( R |`s A ) ) ) |
| 14 | 4, 8, 10, 13 | #P_syl3anc | |- ( ( A e. ( SubRing ` R ) /\ X e. A /\ Y e. A ) -> ( X ( .r ` ( R |`s A ) ) Y ) e. ( Base ` ( R |`s A ) ) ) |
| 15 | 2, 1 | #P_ressmulr | |- ( A e. ( SubRing ` R ) -> .x. = ( .r ` ( R |`s A ) ) ) |
| 16 | 15 | #P_3ad2ant1 | |- ( ( A e. ( SubRing ` R ) /\ X e. A /\ Y e. A ) -> .x. = ( .r ` ( R |`s A ) ) ) |
| 17 | 16 | #P_oveqd | |- ( ( A e. ( SubRing ` R ) /\ X e. A /\ Y e. A ) -> ( X .x. Y ) = ( X ( .r ` ( R |`s A ) ) Y ) ) |
| 18 | 14, 17, 7 | #P_3eltr4d | |- ( ( A e. ( SubRing ` R ) /\ X e. A /\ Y e. A ) -> ( X .x. Y ) e. A ) |
